kube_error: An error has occurred loading the information: {{message}}
kube_service_description_information: You will find here general information about your managed Kubernetes service, and how to access it using theKubectl tool.
kube_service_description_reset: You can reset you cluster at any time.
kube_service_file_error: An error has occurred loading the kubeconfig file
kube_service_file_help: The kubectl command-line tool uses kubeconfig files to find the information it needs to choose a cluster and communicate with the API server of a cluster.
kube_service_file_more_information: More information can be found here
kube_service_reset_title: Réinitialiser la configuration de votre cluster Kubernetes
kube_service_reset_message: En cliquant ici vous remettrez votre service Kubernetes dans son état original. Cela supprimera l'intégralité de vos nœuds de calcul, vos services, leur configuration etc... Cette action est irréversible.
kube_service_reset_success: Votre cluster Kubernetes est en cours de réinitialisation.
kube_service_reset_error: Une erreur est survenue lors de la réinitialisation de votre cluster : {{ message }}
kube_service_reset_enter: Entrez "RESET" dans le champ ci-dessous pour confirmer
kube_nodes_add_region: During beta stage, your nodes will be spwawned in GRA5. We will allow you to change this in the future.
kube_nodes_add_flavor_error: An error has occurred loading the flavors: {{message}}
kube_nodes_add_flavor: Select a Flavor in our PCI catalogue
kube_nodes_add_flavor_QUOTA_VCPUS: Projektin kiintiö ei salli koneen lisäämistä, jossa on näin paljon CPU:ta.
kube_nodes_add_flavor_QUOTA_RAM: Projektin kiintiö ei salli koneen lisäämistä, jossa on näin paljon RAM-muistia.
kube_nodes_add_flavor_QUOTA_INSTANCE: Olet saavuttanut koneiden enimmäismäärän tällä alueella.
kube_nodes_add_error: An error has occurred adding the node: {{message}}
kube_nodes_delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete {{ node}} ?
kube_nodes_delete_enter: Type DELETE in the following field to confirm your action.
kube_nodes_delete_error: An error has occurred deleting the node: {{message}}
kube_nodes_error: An error has occurred loading nodes: {{message}}
kube_nodes_flavor_error: An error has occurred loading flavor
kube_nodes_project_error: An error has occurred loading public cloud project
kube_nodes_description_project_1: Your Kubernetes cluster needs nodes to host your containers and services. All your nodes will be spawned in the {{ description }} public cloud project (we will allow to change this in a future version of the service).
kube_nodes_description_project_2: Ces instances sont lancées en facturation standard à l'heure. Vous pouvez retrouver les détails sur la facturation et les basculer en forfait mensuel dans votre projet Public Cloud.
kube_nodes_quota_description: Pilven kulutuksen hallitsemiseksi projektin resursseja on rajoitettu.
kube_nodes_quota_more: Jos tarvitset lisää resursseja, napsauta oheista painiketta pyytääksesi niitä asiakaspalvelultamme.
kube_flavor: {{ name }} ({{ cpuNumber }} CPU {{ ramCapacity }}GB RAM {{ diskCapacity }}GB DisK)
kube_containers_description: You will see here all containers and services running in your kubernetes cluster.
kube_containers_description_dashboard: In the meantime, we invite you to use either the `kubectl` command line interface or setup the "Kubernetes Dashboard" in your cluster. Kubernetes Dashboard is a community project consisting in a web UI, that is itself a service exposed in your cluster.
kube_containers_description_dashboard_li: Follow this guide to install Kubernetes Dashboard
kube_containers_description_documentatio: During the beta phase, please find documentation, including how to orchestrate your services and expose them on the internet on the Kubernetes section on labs.ovh.com.
